text: Is slide mein aap Shopify mein collections banane ka tareeqa seekhen gey.  Step-by-step instructions hon gi saath images ke saath.
Apni collections mein products ko add karne ka easy tareeqa seekhen. Images aur text ki madad se step-by-step guide.
Apne online store ke liye zaruri legal pages jaise Privacy Policy aur Terms of Service banane ka tareeqa. Templates aur instructions.

step_heading: Legal Pages ko Website se Link Karein
text: Apne legal pages ko apni website se properly link karne ka tareeqa.  Step-by-step guide images ke saath.
